--- select_literals_date.sql
SELECT
  DATE'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27'),
  DATE r'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP '2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08',
  TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
  TIMESTAMP'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27'),
  TIMESTAMP r'2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27') AS FOO,
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27') AS BAR

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.DateLiteral{
          Date:  9,
          Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 13,
            ValueEnd: 25,
            Value:    "2014-09-27",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 46,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 29,
            NameEnd: 33,
            Name:    "DATE",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 34,
                ValueEnd: 46,
                Value:    "2014-09-27",
              },
            },
          },
          NamedArgs: []*ast.NamedArg(nil),
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.DateLiteral{
          Date:  51,
          Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 56,
            ValueEnd: 69,
            Value:    "2014-09-27",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.TimestampLiteral{
          Timestamp: 73,
          Value:     &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 83,
            ValueEnd: 110,
            Value:    "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.TimestampLiteral{
          Timestamp: 114,
          Value:     &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 124,
            ValueEnd: 168,
            Value:    "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.TimestampLiteral{
          Timestamp: 172,
          Value:     &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 181,
            ValueEnd: 193,
            Value:    "2014-09-27",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 219,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 197,
            NameEnd: 206,
            Name:    "TIMESTAMP",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 207,
                ValueEnd: 219,
                Value:    "2014-09-27",
              },
            },
          },
          NamedArgs: []*ast.NamedArg(nil),
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.TimestampLiteral{
          Timestamp: 224,
          Value:     &ast.StringLiteral{
            ValuePos: 234,
            ValueEnd: 247,
            Value:    "2014-09-27",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 268,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 251,
            NameEnd: 255,
            Name:    "DATE",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 256,
                ValueEnd: 268,
                Value:    "2014-09-27",
              },
            },
          },
          NamedArgs: []*ast.NamedArg(nil),
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 273,
            NameEnd: 276,
            Name:    "FOO",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 302,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 280,
            NameEnd: 289,
            Name:    "TIMESTAMP",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 290,
                ValueEnd: 302,
                Value:    "2014-09-27",
              },
            },
          },
          NamedArgs: []*ast.NamedArg(nil),
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 307,
            NameEnd: 310,
            Name:    "BAR",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT DATE "2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27"), DATE "2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27"), TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27") AS FOO, TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27") AS BAR
